Mis.Lyn told me about his group. Thanks Lyn! I want to build my own Franks Box but I think it is going to be more difficult than I thought.
   Leslie took my digital recorder to the basment to leave it there while she was at work. I am listening to it while I type. We have had a problem with her little boy ghost Robert only whispering when he answers questions. At the begining of the recording I heard her ask Robert to speak up and talk louder LOL!!! I have heard what sounds like a box being shoved across the floor. I will have to show her this.Nobody is at home while this recording is going on.
  Hugs,Elizabeth

Zack Widup <w9sz@...> wrote:
          
Hi Elizabeth,

AHA! You appear here, too!
:-)

No, I haven't done that yet. I dug thru my junquebox of electronic parts 
to gather together what I needed to make one, but didn't have a few parts 
and never got around to ordering them. Maybe one of these days, I hope ...

Zack

On Tue, 8 Apr 2008, Elizabeth Rettig wrote:

> Zack, have you ever made your own Franks box?
> Elizabeth
>
> Zack Widup <w9sz@...> wrote:
>
> I'm sure there are lots of Radio Shacks out in the boonies that have a few
> in stock that aren't going to get people coming in to buy them to hack. I
> can think of a dozen fairly small towns around here that have Radio Shacks
> and probably no people around with paranormal interests.
>
> Zack
>
> On Tue, 8 Apr 2008, LC Duplatt wrote:
>
>> LOL! Well, I guess the deal will be on eBay, Frank. Just kidding...
>>
>> LC
>>


                           

       
---------------------------------
You rock. That's why Blockbuster's offering you one month of Blockbuster Total Access, No Cost.
